column1: Uchi////I arrived about 10 minutes before opening without a reservation and a line was already forming. The hosts/hostesses took down names for the wait list and passed out delicious sushi samples. If your entire party is not there within 15 minutes
column2: they will give your table away and may have to wait a lot longer for the next available table. We were seated right away
column3: and the entire restaurant filled up very quickly. Our server
column5: was great and knew his stuff. We just ate 'chef's selection style' and had him surprise us
column6: and every single item brought to the table was amazing from a few types of nigiri
column9: and this incredibly tasty broth with a coconut milk base. Cucumber sake cocktail was delicious as was the other sake selections. Overall great dining experience and will definitely return!
